entry.tran: 计划不周的;不连贯的;散乱的
entry.def: If you describe something as scrappy, you disapprove of it because it seems to be badly planned or untidy.

example.ex: The final chapter is no more than a scrappy addition.
example.tran: 最后一章不过是一些支离破碎的补充内容。
